title: Experiment Metrics Snapshot
description: Structured record of metrics, timings, and config lineage from a pipeline stage (train, predict, diagnose, submit). Ensures reproducibility, comparability, and auditability across runs.

run_id.description: Unique identifier for the run/session (UUID, timestamp, or hash).

stage.description: Pipeline stage this snapshot corresponds to.

metrics.description: Key numeric metrics. Includes competition score (GLL), training/validation losses, and physics-informed diagnostics.

gll.description: Gaussian Log-Likelihood (competition metric, with FGS1 weighting).

tags.description: Optional user-defined labels for experiment management.

config_hash.description: Stable hash of Hydra/DVC config snapshot used for this run.

git_rev.description: Git commit SHA (or tag) at which the run was executed.

env.description: Environment metadata for CI ↔ Kaggle parity and determinism.

created_at.description: Timestamp when metrics snapshot was generated.
